location_descriptions.title: Reguengos de Monsaraz, Évora, Portugal
location_descriptions.content:
Rua Pedro Alvares Cabral is a vibrant street in Évora, Portugal, offering a plethora of attractions and amenities for visitors to enjoy. Situated just 1.7 kilometers away from the Évora station, it provides easy access for travelers. This charming street is home to several historical landmarks, including the Templo Romano Évora, a well-preserved Roman temple that showcases the city's rich history. Additionally, the Chapel of Bones, with its macabre yet intriguing interior made entirely of human bones, offers a unique and thought-provoking experience.

For those seeking spiritual solace, the Cathedral of Évora stands tall, showcasing stunning Gothic architecture and housing beautiful religious artifacts. The nearby Igreja e Mosteiro de São Francisco is another must-visit attraction, boasting intricate Manueline and Gothic styles and an impressive collection of religious art.

When it comes to dining and entertainment, Rua Pedro Alvares Cabral has something to offer for every palate. O Templo is a delightful restaurant that serves delicious local cuisine, allowing visitors to savor traditional flavors in a warm and inviting atmosphere. For burger enthusiasts, Triangular® - Hamburgueria Artesanal is a popular spot, offering unique and mouthwatering artisanal burgers.

Whether you are a history buff, a food lover, or simply looking for a memorable experience, Rua Pedro Alvares Cabral in Évora is a street that will captivate and delight you.

location_descriptions.title: Getting around
location_descriptions.content:
The property is easily accessible by public transport and car.

The nearest train station, Evora, is a 36-minutes drive.

Humberto Delgado Airport is an hour and 49-minute drive from the property.

description:
This spacious two-bedroom house in Reguengos de Monsaraz is perfect for families looking to stay in the city centre. It has everything you need for a pleasant stay. The property is close to various attractions (e.g. Templo Romano Évora, Praça do Giraldo), good restaurants and shops, and the Evora station is 36 minutes drive away.

The space
Welcome to our home!

The kitchen is equipped with a cooking plate, oven, fridge, microwave, coffee machine, and other utilities for your use.

There is a living area with a sofa where you can relax after a day exploring the area.

You will also find a lovely private patio with a table, chairs, and an electric grill.

The bedrooms come with a double bed and a king XL bed with hotel-quality linens for maximum comfort.

The bathroom is equipped with all you need for your stay.

Free WiFi is available in all areas of the apartment.

Towels and bed linen are provided for your stay.

Service is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week, for your convenience. The home is always professionally cleaned for your comfort.

Enjoy your stay!

NOTE: This house is located near tourist points, pharmacies, museums, restaurants, and mini-markets which are all within a 2-minute walking distance.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property.

Other things to note
This property is a self-check-in property, and you will be requested to verify your identity before checking into the property.

There is a zero-tolerance policy for smoking on the property. If our team discovers evidence that this rule has been breached (e.g., smoke smell, ashes, butts, etc.), we fully reserve the right to charge a €200 smoking fee at minimum.

Please note that for stays longer than 30 nights, a fair use policy of the utilities will apply with a limit of 80€.

For the first days, we provide the basic amenities: samples of shower gel, shampoo, soap, toilet paper, kitchen roll, sponge, dishwashing products and bin bag.

Extra keys: 20€ (extra pair of keys when available, lost keys or service to open the door during your stay).
Extra cleaning with linen: the price of a cleaning fee.
Extra Clothing: 30€ (Towels and sheets for 2pax, i.e. when the sofa bed is not included).

Registration number
030822/AL

location_descriptions.content: We are located within the locality of Reguengos de Monsaraz. We are 10mint walk from downtown, easy access to restaurants, pastries, municipal market, wine shop, supermarkets, among others. Monsaraz Castle, Alqueva and River Beach are 10 miles away. Évora, World Heritage Site, is just 36 km away.

description:
Charming and rustic are the characteristics that best define Casa MonReal, located in the heart of Alentejo, close to Lake Alqueva and the beautiful Medieval Village of Monsaraz, here you will feel at home. For you we have friendliness, comfort, tranquility. If you wish, you can enjoy the excellent breakfast prepared especially for you.(additional cost) In the area there are numerous activities to carry out or simply enjoy the beautiful Alentejo landscape.

The space
We are an accommodation establishment, family atmosphere and rustic decoration.

Common areas with fridge, microwave, toaster, dishwasher, tea maker, dining room, living room

I am fully available to provide any information or clarification.

location_descriptions.content:
The house is located in the center of Reguengos de Monsaraz, which will allow guests to be a few meters from varied places of interest, such as catering, museums, city hall, city garden, church and typical shops.
Less than 20 minutes by car you can find many other public spaces, such as the famous Alentejo river beaches, wineries with wine tourism, star observatories and many others from different branches of interest.

It is required for ALL guests that will stay in the studio.

For all non-town guests, it is mandatory to fill out the registration form of the Temporary Foreign Police "SEF" registration form, it will be sent to you automatically upon email.

description:
Fantastic Accommodation for unique experience in the historic center of Reguengos de Monsaraz.

Located on the upper floor of a 19th century mansion, consisting of 6 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, kitchen/kitchenette, living room with fireplace, balcony, viewpoint with unique views over the entire city and access to the outside area with pool and private parking.

The space
Bedroom 1- 1 double bed
Bedroom 2- 1 double bed
Bedroom 3- 1 double bed
Bedroom 4- 2 single bed/ 1 double bed
Bedroom 5- 1 bunk bed
6- toddler room with 2 beds

Full bathroom with bathtub and shower
Bathroom 2- complete with shower and washing machine.

Kitchen- equipped with induction hob, refrigerator, oven, microwave and coffee machine.

Large living room with dining table, fireplace and TV.

Balcony- backyard/pool view with dining table, barbecue and clothesline.

Viewpoint overlooking the entire city.

Spacious outdoor area in the backyard of the house, with swimming pool, living area, and parking space.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire upper floor of the mansion, which is exclusive to them, private access to the viewpoint and access to the outdoor/swimming pool/parking area.

Other things to note
The lower floor is exclusive to the owners, these two houses being totally independent of each other and are the only ones with access to the outdoor area/parking/pool.

description:
Herdade do Corval is an agrotourism estate located in Reguengos de Monsaraz, considered the capital of the Alentejo wines.
It is also close to the Alqueva Dam and Beach, the largest dam in Europe, Castelo de Monsaraz and is located 40 min from Évora.
The house consists of 3 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, living room with fireplace, dining room and a fully equipped kitchen, barbecue, deck with adult and children's pool.
There is cultivation of vineyards, olive trees, orchard and animals.

Other things to note
More info @orval inheritance

Registration number
83184AL

house_rules.aditional:
1. For a safe stay of our guests, please be advised that parents will always be responsible for their children. ESPECIALLY regarding THE POOL AREA, both inside and outside the pool, and in any area with stairs. 

2. Smoking AREA is restricted to the outside only.

3. Please be respectful of the recycling rules.

4. Regarding noise, we appreciate that, in consideration of the neighbors, they end at midnight.

5. Please use the towels available for the pool only.

highlights.subtitle: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

description:
"Santa Solitaire" Enjoy a stylish experience at this central place in Reguengos , in the tranquility of the Alentejo.
Spend the day exploring Wineries ,with the opportunity to taste the quality of our wines, Pottery, the possibility of being Potter, creating your Artwork, Alqueva, ex-libris of Alentejo in which you can perform water sports and enjoy the sunshine of our river beaches.
Visit historic sites such as Monsaraz Castle and at night the Dark sky Alqueva.

The space
SANTA PATIENCE a space perfect for families or a group of friends.
We offer luxurious accommodation with excellent comfort.
All rooms have been designed and decorated with modern touches of our Alentejo.
The outdoor patio offers several spaces to relax, read a book or just enjoy a glass of the famous Alentejo wine! You can still just cool off in the pool.
Outside the kitchen, fully equipped, you will be able to taste your meals in a comfortable shaded area.
We also have a lounge waiting for you to spend the evenings, with fantastic lighting.

Registration number
124672/AL

house_rules.aditional: For comfort and enjoyment of all, we request that noise levels be reduced to a minimum between 22h - 09h

location_descriptions.title: Reguengos de Monsaraz, Évora, Portugal
location_descriptions.content:
The apartment is located 4 minutes walk from the central square of Reguengos de Monsaraz and several restaurants. The municipal swimming pools are 400 metres from the accommodation.
The main attractions are Monsaraz Castle, Monsaraz River Beach, Cromeleque do Xarez, Dark Sky Alqueva Observatory, Herdade Esporão, Roman Temple, Menir do Outeiro, Sé ( Cathedral ), José de Sousa Winery, Amieira River Beach, Capela dos Ossos, Ervideira wine lounge.

highlights.title: Great check-in experience
highlights.subtitle: 100% of recent guests gave the check-in process a 5-star rating.

highlights.title: Great communication
highlights.subtitle: 95% of recent guests rated Carlos 5-star in communication.

description:
Porta Reguengos is a recently refurbished modern apartment, very central and with free parking 50 meters away. The accommodation allows up to 4 people being 1 bedroom double bed and 1 sofa bed in the living room. It has several restaurants within 4 minutes walking.

The space
The Porta Reguengos accommodation is a modern and refurbished and very central apartment and has free parking on the surrounding streets. There are cafes, restaurants, and snack bars a 3-4 min walk away.

Guest access
The apartment is for the exclusive use of the guests and consists of a double bedroom with wardrobe, full bathroom and living room with sofa bed, equipped kitchen and large balcony with outdoor table.
The kitchen is equipped with dishwasher, hob, countertop refrigerator, microwave, coffee maker, kettle and toaster. The kitchen is also equipped with all the necessary equipment for preparing meals ( pots, plates, glasses, cutlery, etc. ).

Registration number
123962/AL

description:
Studio Apartment T0 in the center of Reguengos Monsaraz, with a small kitchen, refrigerator, stove, Microwave. It has a patio and private bathroom.

No R/C regardless of the rest of the house where we live.

The space
A large , independent , fully equipped studio in the Reguengos Centre of Monsaraz.

It is not recommended for persons over 65 years of age or reduced mobility for reasons of the small bathroom and that we do not provide personal and permanent assistance.

Guest access
You have access to your Studio, your private bathroom , separated by a hallway, and the patio.

Other things to note
The bathroom is private, next to the studio but is separated by the entrance hallway

This suite has a large living room and on the upper floor (Mezzanine) a double bed. It is equipped with mini-frigorifico, kettle, coffee machine, air conditioning and flat-screen TV with cable channels.

The private bathroom with walk-in shower is equipped with hairdryer and gel/shampoo.
